{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Belkin F7D3301 01.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Share Max Wireless Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = http://www.belkin.com/us/support-product?rnId=5416 |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |fandom = Belkin_F7D3301_v1 |wikidevi = Belkin_F7D3301 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = Supported |openwrtsupport = Supported (Unofficially) |tomatosupport = Supported |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Belkin |model = F7D3301 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 09/13/2010 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/Belkin_F7D3301_v1 |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = K7SF7D3301V1 |icid = 3623A-F7D3301V1 |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = WG7117F22 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4718A1; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 480 <!-- 480/ 533 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = Parallel |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Eon;EN29LV640B;CFEON (EON) EN29LV640B; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM68B16CWPA-25H;EtronTech EM68B16CWPA-25H N208160AFL03811ZQ (32M x 16 bit DDRII Synchronous DRAM (SDRAM)); |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53115;BCM53115SKFBG; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = CFE;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = WG7117F22 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, FreshTomato, OpenWrt (Unofficially), TomatoUSB (Toastman)
|availability = discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/17/2010 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 722868807378 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833314058 |asin = B004B1Z6EE |asin_country = CA |asin2 = B004PMHF84 |asin_country2 = US |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The default SSID may follow the pattern of '''Belkin.XXXX'''.
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=70454 New Belkin Routers (04/2010)] On the '''DD-WRT''' Forum *[http://tomatousb.org/forum/t-371974/support-for-belkin-f7d7301-f7d3301 On the TomatoUSB forums] :This device is reported to be working with recent Toastman builds.
aka '''F7D7301''' :[http://manojpi.blogspot.com/2012/05/openwrt-on-belkin-share-max-n300.html OpenWrt on a Belkin Share Max N300 (F7D3301 or F7D7301)]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== {{DDWRTNotice|belkin}}
Supported by dd-wrt as of = [http://svn.dd-wrt.com:8000/dd-wrt/changeset/15156 v24 k2.6 15156]
Please insert instructions here
